column4: anyway I can change the resolution of a session at the login prompt ?
no I mean, change the resolution I am about to login into
I changed the resolution in -session and  the screen decided it was "out of range"
have you tried login using failsafe (gnome or terminal) session and fixing it?
CLI command would be damned welcome
I just changed the resolution via the GUI
really now, that barely sounds like a good idea
I'll give it a try I guess..
why? this is local setting and without it gnome should just load defaults
there is no file called monitor.xml is gnome2
all right! it worked! thanks a bunch :) :)
